overview: There are guys like that who smell of sex from miles away. Aday Traun is one of them. Top only, he is that big, strong, bogus Spanish guy with whom the boys like to hang out. Alpha and nice in everyday life, Aday turns into a ruthless hunk when it comes time to fuck. This earned him the title of Barcelona's best fucker! No bottom can resist him and in this film it's a festival of ball-deep fucking! At his contact all the guys turn into super dogs in need of a tail. That's the brand of the best fuckers.
title: Aday Traun: Barcelona's Hottest Fucker
